name: Castle Defense.
description:
An epic heroic castle defense war where you need to collect and level up legendary heroes, unlock each hero's ultimate skills, and strategically deploy them to defend against attacks!

Game Features.
- Easily placed tower defense play (TD), addictive tower defense
- Legendary heroes from all over the world (RPG), each with their own unique skills!
- Upgrade castles and archers for greater combat power
- The town's gold mines, treasures and talents are yours to explore.
Use auto-battles to earn rewards while relaxing!
Play with people from all over the world and compete on global leaderboards!
